about_the_game:
Welcome to The Mystical Traveler, a unique video game where you play as the most wonderful cube in the universe, driven by a single goal: to take control of the universe. To achieve this, you must complete various missions across mysterious planets and unexplored solar systems.

Blending platforming and strategy, this 2D game with a refined visual style promises an immersive experience. Customize your character to shape your own adventure and explore a multitude of diverse worlds filled with puzzles, traps, and challenges of all kinds.

Embark on a soothing and captivating solo adventure, available at the end of 2025. The universe is waiting for you!
detailed_description:
Welcome to The Mystical Traveler, a unique video game where you play as the most wonderful cube in the universe, driven by a single goal: to take control of the universe. To achieve this, you must complete various missions across mysterious planets and unexplored solar systems.

Blending platforming and strategy, this 2D game with a refined visual style promises an immersive experience. Customize your character to shape your own adventure and explore a multitude of diverse worlds filled with puzzles, traps, and challenges of all kinds.

Embark on a soothing and captivating solo adventure, available at the end of 2025. The universe is waiting for you!
name: The Mystical Traveler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 ou AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: You play as a cube whose mission is to conquer the universe, solar system after solar system. For each planet, you will have to complete different tasks in order to progress towards your ultimate goal.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
